name: Ricochet - Ludum Dare 40
description:
Ricochet is a fast paced twin-stick shooter in which players must survive the onslaught of red tic-tacs. 

If the player shoots themselves it will instantly spawn another enemy and decreases the overall spawn time for enemies.

Controls:
(Gamepad Only)

-Left stick - Move
-Right Stick - Aim
-Right Trigger - Fire
-Start Button - Pause
-Keyboard 'R' - Restart

(If you find any bugs let me know)
